#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int date,year;
    string month;
    cin>>date>>month>>year;
    int sum=date;
    if(month=="January")
    {
        sum*=1;
    }
    if(month=="February")
    {
        sum*=2;
    }
    if(month=="March")
    {
        sum*=3;
    }
    if(month=="April")
    {
        sum*=4;
    }
    if(month=="May")
    {
        sum*=5;
    }
    if(month=="June")
    {
        sum*=6;
    }
    if(month=="July")
    {
        sum*=7;
    }if(month=="August")
    {
        sum*=8;
    }
    if(month=="September")
    {
        sum*=9;
    }if(month=="October")
    {
        sum*=10;
    }if(month=="November")
    {
        sum*=11;
    }
    if(month=="December")
    {
        sum*=12;
    }
    sum+=year;

    while(sum/10!=0)
    {
        sum=(sum/1000)+((sum/100)%10)+((sum/10)%10)+(sum%10);
    }
    cout<<sum;

}
